@Virgin_TrainsEC Tried that, still says the same thing. (the 15:08 form London Kings Cross)
@Virgin_TrainsEC WiFi broken on IE, Chrome or safari, says there is a privacy error. I paid extra for WiFi and now forced to use phones 4G
I know the term 'champagne socialist' is supposed to be an insult but who doesn't want universal healthcare and a nice glass of bubbly?
@arborwildes I have so much snake stuff in my Amazon wishlist despite not being able to own a snake yet
@arborwildes @LaureeHou Wars of the Roses stuff! Late, but still... https://t.co/eF02DaHg9a
@bethanywhite can I be sent a link once a copy is online?
@bethanywhite Yes, we have and I would be exeptionally grateful if you could publish my appology to Thames Water!!
@thameswater We've bitched and moaned but thank you for working Xmas Day. Mince Pies and apologies to you all. Xx
@sumerdaze2 @thameswater and the kids?
@hendoGH @thameswater and for the children?
There is no running water in Twickenham on Christmas Day, can't cook Christmas dinner. Merry Christmas to you all. Bah humbug. @thameswater
@bendypitts @thameswater Excellent!! Just the kids to work out now.
@thameswater No water at all in TW2!
@thameswater It's Christmas Day, all the shops are shut. What do we drink as we have no water?!?
@DoctorChristian Discharged from hospital a few hours ago, so you know, I've been worse.
@greg_jenner When is it on / what Chanel? I NEED THUS IN MY LIFE
@YSJSU I'm a rep and have never had anything at all from my chair. Never heard who it is. This ok for chairs to ignore their reps?
@CrossCountryUK Well, there most definitely is not according to the announcement. No reason given, just no 1st Class service any more.
@CrossCountryUK And now no food service at all in 1st class. I guess I'll go hungry then.
@CrossCountryUK Why suddenly no 1st Class food / no trolley service for the whole train derby-edinburgh? (on the 14:25 depart from Plymouth)
@CrossCountryUK Asked for a cheese sandwich at 3:30. The man never came back, now 6:33 and none left. 1st member of staff seen since 3:30
@CrossCountryUK I would, but I have not seen any staff since 15:30. #wheredidtheygo?
@CrossCountryUK on the 14:25 Plymouth to Edinburgh. Coach A is so cold I have goosebumps. Are there heating issues?
Staff "I'll go and have a look for you." 54 minutes later he is yet to return. I'll take that as a no.
@JRhodesPianist he has a cushion but prefers to sit there. https://t.co/jIuyvAcf2s
@CrossCountryUK On @ York, fault socket, teminated @ Sheffield, forced change at B'ham, standing room only. Not like I have places to be...
My #bristolpostgradstory is, thus far, a tale of woe at the hands of @CrossCountryUK. Here's hoping I make it.
@CrossCountryUK [10:45 from York] now offloaded to another train which now has a change I booked specifically to avoid. Delay of 40 minutes
@CrossCountryUK [10:45 from York] and now stuck in Sheffield station because the doors are all stuck. Marvellous
@CrossCountryUK [10:45 from York] any chance of working sockets in coach D and a tannoy loud enough to hear?
@arborwildes yeah, probably.
So, from twitter today I've learnt an American sports team won a thing? A thing they haven't won for a while? No idea what sport though.
@YSJSU When will the minutes be online and where on the website will they be?
@BritishGasHelp Just to confirm its a scam. You don't leave bill replacement voicemails from a number starting 0776, right?
@arborwildes wait whaaaat? This needs an explanation!!
I just LOVE being unable to do what I'd planned because if road closures that were never signed/ mentioned #marathon @NYorksPolice
@greg_jenner a twattery?
@arborwildes Oh wow!! Thats half a bottle of water!! :D
Sleeping pattern? What on Earth is one of those?
@TheLastLeg #isitok for this to be a printed sign, on full display? https://t.co/uUiDY41gnR
The 'unelectable' Jeremy Corbyn gets elected. Again. We need to redefine 'unelectable.'

@DoctorChristian @BootsUK Went to York branch w/ broken one. Was told to go to GP for urgent appt and get prescription. Old one had name on
@DoctorChristian I've asked and was told no, few months ago in North Yorkshire.
@CrossCountryUK No air-con leaving Plymouth at 11:25am, still no air-con SIX HOURS later arriving in York. No explanation. Not good enough
Yeah, this seems like the perfect seat. https://t.co/Umy3tKmfH9
My train ticket for Friday cost £52, with a railcard. The same railcard and same train would have been £219 for first class. What the fuck?
@Toffee_Tootsie Yeah, that's why I'm basically a hermit. Welcome to Hermits United.
Can that car alarm please stop now? 17 minutes of screaming noise is a little bit irritating!!
@arborwildes I've fallen asleep fully clothed twice this week. Sleeping patterns seem not to be a thing in this house.
@ErinGreetham My late night browsing started with looking for knitting patterns and has ended with me looking into spinning my own wool.....
"If you don't like that comment, don't read it!" How am I supposed to know if I will like the comment or not without reading it?
Remain take the lead. Please please PLEASE hold that lead!
This is all starting to go horribly wrong
@arborwildes Maybe they thought they were voting to leave Sunderland?
@arborwildes "Remain is only 49.5%. Time to panic!" FIVE have declared out of 382. Calm.

Go and vote! You don't need to take your poll card, just turn up! Every vote counts and every single one is needed.
@annehelen The Help? No romance and I can't think of a single make characters name!!
@arborwildes Watching it this exact second. The same can be said about Boarder Force.
I don't understand people, specifically those who move into a house next to a motorway or in a flight path then complain about the noise.
@TheBradSherwood you forgot ha'penny and threepence.
People mad they're not registered to vote due to the website crash. You had MONTHS to register but waited till an hour before the deadline?
@WeAreZizzi #zizzibambini Sasha entertaining herself while waiting for pizza. https://t.co/DWXz1VSxqW
@SW_Trains "due to crush conditions on board this service..." The look of horror from the platform as we rolled into Clapham Junction
@EmmaJLing "we are sorry for the inconvenience caused by the crush on this service" Crush indeed @SW_Trains, crush indeed.
"Sorry for the short formation today, this is due to the other half of this train being in repair" Still, beats leaves on the line I suppose
@arborwildes Or even just pass out. Or set the fire alarms off. Anything.
I rejected a salesman at my front door. Closed to door to hear a very loud "What the FUCK!". Lovely guy. Truly charming.
All that money and they keep us in an unheated room..... #YSJHCC2016
I now have goosebumps. Please turn the heating on! #ysjhcc2016
@arborwildes and @LaureeHou at #ysjhcc2016. https://t.co/df9LykCXXW
#ysjhcc2016 you made the presentation, only you will notice mistakes. Deep breath. We're ALL nervous!!
Promises to send the final version that afternoon. Doesn't, so I do it myself and send it at 1:27am ready to go in the morning. Group work.
@JillianMichaels Option 1. Option 2 looks a little...forced. 1 is more natural
Wrote answer to past paper and asked the lecturer if he could look at it to see where I'm going wrong before the exam. He said no. Why?!?!?
York people! I ordered from Mirchiz, Fishergate & clingfilm baked into it. Calling Trading Standards when they open. https://t.co/1gEoEzHycV
Dissertation proposal officially submitted! I'm not panicking fir no reason, totally calm, not worried, nope, nothing to see here..
@YSJSU Yes, I'm not going as I can't afford it. It's celebration, cost shouldn't be a limiting factor in celebrating our own achievements.
@EE even though the current router is only a few months old? Please tell me you won't charge us for a new one
@EE I reset the router to factory settings twice. Didn't make any difference.
@EE This is still there. Technical support were no help at all and decided leaving us with no connection was fine https://t.co/3quEQH57bK
@EE are now ignoring me completely. "committed to excellent customer service" ANY service would be nice. Answer the phone, reply here...
@itsmylifeslm @EE Same here! I practically have them on speed dial. If we could switch, we would.
Three cheers for @VodafoneUK and their 4G. At least I have some Internet access after @EE utterly failed with their broadband.
Turns out @EE technical helpline can't fix a technical issue and just leaves us without any service at all and no other options to fix it.
@EE I did. They can't do anything at all. Committed to providing excellent customer service? *laughs hysterically*
@EE and the yellow triangle of doom. My constant companion which resetting the router to factor settings didn't fix. https://t.co/uF1pK2Uhd9
If my WiFi breaks one more time, I'm throwing the router out the window. I'm paying for a service and not getting anything!! @EE, you twats.
